text: Gordon Kyle Diez Cormier (born 2009) is a Filipino-Canadian actor. He played Joe in The Stand (2020) and plays Aang in the Netflix live-action remake of the Avatar: The Last Airbender series. Cormier is of Filipino descent. He grew up in Vancouver, British Columbia. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2009 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Actors from Vancouver Category:Canadian child actors
title: Gordon Cormier
